description:
ThymeTech DLL

All Classes below are thread safe

- Windows Validation (confirm that windows is legal and registered)
- Versioning of EXE's and DLL's 
- Twitter intergration (send / read messages)
- Thread Management (make controls - RichTextBox, TextBox, ProgressBar) thread safe
- Control over system date and time (ability to update / change / read the time and date)
- Convert Datatable -> CSV file (specify 3 parameters [DataTable, Separator for CSV eg: ",", and outputFileName)
- Convert CSV -> Datatable - similar to above
- Convert Dictionary -> CSV
- Convert CSV -> Dictionary
- Registration (GUI to register, Class to verify registration)
- Database utilities (MySQL, Pervasive, MsSQL) - like transaction handling (being, commit, rollback), connecting, etc...
- Logging class - link class to RichTextBox on form, all logging will go to richtextbox and be saved in log file with date stamp
- FTP Utilities - isValidConnection, Connect, GetFileList, DownloadFileAsText, DeleteFile, UploadFile
- Encryption Class (encrypt/decrypt our own registration and passwords, and Pastel Evolution passwords)
- Emailing class - Validate Address, SendGmail, SendEmail
- Configuration File (we use this to save settings etc.., its a standard windows ini file)
- Class that stores our common images / logos as byte array's and returns an object of type "Image"
- Zip / Unzip all files types (7zip, Rar, Zip, Gz, etc...) - view progress of unzip/zip also possible
- Website API's
 - City Power
 - Eskom
 - Eye Witness News
 - Google Maps
- Internet Explorer class - controls IE, allows you to open a IE window and send key's to items on the HTML based on their name / id and press buttons
- Microsoft Excel class - export datatable to excel, read excel sheet as datatable
- CSV File reading / writing - and handling advanced things like commas wrapped in double-quotes etc..
releaseNotes: Fixed a bug in loading 2016.07.26 version of the DLL
title: ThymeTech DLL
